name: Buffalo Wild Wings, Inc.
description: Buffalo Wild Wings, Inc. is a leading American casual dining restaurant and sports bar chain known for its extensive menu of chicken wings, burgers, and other comfort foods, combined with an energetic atmosphere perfect for sports fans. Founded in 1982 in Columbus, Ohio, by Jim Disbrow and Scott Lowery, Buffalo Wild Wings has grown to become a staple in the casual dining sector, boasting over 1,200 locations across the United States and internationally. The restaurant is particularly famous for its signature sauces and seasonings, offering a wide range of flavors to cater to every palate. In addition to its food offerings, Buffalo Wild Wings provides an immersive sports viewing experience, featuring numerous large-screen televisions broadcasting live sports events, making it a popular destination for sports enthusiasts. The company also emphasizes community engagement through various sponsorships and promotions, including partnerships with local sports teams. Buffalo Wild Wings aims to provide excellent service and a vibrant dining experience, making it a beloved choice for families and friends looking to enjoy good food and great sports together.
